rComments: Great Professor and Lab Coordinator!!

Dr. Avaron is great, had him for BIO1130 labs as well. However, make sure to read the PDFs for each module, because his labs are super easy, but you can get marks off for not following the simplest rules. Overall very sweet though, and lessened labs.
I loved the online labs. Very well organized. Thank you.

Dr. Avaron is a GEM. He literally helps so much (and gives answers) if you go to his office hours. His labs can sometimes be confusing to start, but he gives you all the resources, and is really kind through email as well. His labs were way easier than CHM1311 LABS, and never had any harsh rules (no strict rules about font size, etc). Amazing!!!!!

A horrible horrible professor. If you can get a different one, I highly recommend you do. He does NOT want anyone to succeed. Genuinely seems to want students to fail. One of the worst teachers I've ever had. An absolute waste of time, money, and sanity.

The labs were the only good part of the BIO 1140 course and this lab was very well organized and helped a lot with understanding of course content. If you can choose him as a lab coordinator I definitely recommend!
teacherRatingTags: ['Get ready to read', 'Gives good feedback', 'Clear grading criteria']

rComments: Can't speak for Prof Avaron as a teacher, but as a lab coordinator he has been wonderful. He is accessible through email and answers promptly. His labs are easy to follow and understand, and are well structured. You don't feel that he's out to get you, unlike another LC in the chem department. Take the time to read through, and you will succeed.
can't really talk about his teaching abilities, but as the bio lab coordinator, he is a gem. very easy to approach and the labs are very manageable and take little time out of your day!
can't speak to his teaching abilities but as a lab coordinator he is pretty solid. fair labs and don't take 30+ hours like the labs assigned by the chemistry lab coordinator.

He is so nice. He is always available for help, and he removed 1 of the labs when he saw that we had a lot of work. The bio labs are very reasonable in length, and he is very good about giving extensions if you need them. All around, a great lab coordinator. However, follow the guidelines/experiment directions exactly AS IS, or you lose marks
The best lab coordinator, very clear expectations and easy labs that require only few hours to finish.

I had Avaron as a lab coordinator for BIO1130. He was incredibly accommodating and reasonable in his expectations. The labs were easy and didn't require a ridiculous amount of time to complete. He also cancelled our last lab and gave us the opportunity to take a bonus quiz to increase our grade.

Boring lectures. Found his lectures very confusing and had to use the textbook a lot just to get an explanation that made sense. His part of the class is small and simple enough if you study properly.

RIDICULOUS MIDTERM!!! We spent so much time on new, relevant material, and all he tested on was STUPID details of diffusion and macromolecules? I could not have possibly studied harder and he didn't test 98% of my knowledge??? Too bad french students have no choice, and the english prof is no better lmao
SOOOO it would be a lil helpful (in my opinion tbh) if this mans can speak UP a bit omygAAAAADDDD srsly thooo ridiculous. do not take.
Horrible prof... its his answer or no answer. If you dont have to take it, dont bother.

Il m'a enseigné la première partie de bio1540 et oui ses examen sont difficiles (beaucoup de petits détailles), mais tout ce qu'il y avait dans l'examen avait été vu en classe contrairement aux examens données par l'autre professeure.

Il a de bon powerpoint cependanr la matière au examen ne reflète pas completement le contenue  de ceux-ci.  Les laboratoire sont assez simple et l'examen de laboratoire très facile si vous connaisser bien la matière vue en laboratoire.

For an immersion student, i personally found his  french to be really clear. However, his midterm and final exam had questions which had an air of "I have tons of power so I can ask whatever I want" within them.   His powerpoints were very clear and detailed which pays dividends when reviewing.

Doesn't want you to succeed. His grading scheme is made to make most people fail. He is irrational with his marking and is very rude when you want to speak to him for clarifications. You will not get the grade you deserve in his class. I felt that my money was wasted in that class because my efforts were not reflected at all. Worst prof yet.

This prof id by far the rudest person I've met whether it's over e-mail or in person. He has an attitude problem and does not like to accept the fact that he's made mistakes. His grading scheme does not reflect if a student understands and is irrational. He basically wants the worst for you. Avoid him at all cost, literally pain in the ass.
Very monotonous, puts you to sleep. Has unrealistic expectations and his grading scheme is illogical. Avoid if you can.

This prof speaks quickly and reads directly off the slides, the exams and midterms are difficult because he creates his own marking scheme and only answers from the marking scheme are marked correct (even if your answer makes sensecorrect). he posts lecture recordings so you can relisten to them before the exams but you may bore yourself to death

I didn't really enjoy this prof at all. He speaks VERY quickly and it's difficult to keep up, take notes, and try to understand all at the same time. Because he goes too fast its hard to keep up so basically you get lost and just fall asleep. I don't recommend this prof at all.
worldstar

Even with A LOT of studying, the exam was difficult. I studied even more for his exam than some of my finals last semester, and I only got an ok note. He will not question you on, for exemple, how something works overall, but he will ask you a SPECIFIC detail about it that you most likely didn't pay attention to. His classes are boring, avoid!!
horrible.

Les cours sont superr long.. Il lit les power pointe. Pas nécessairement besoin d'aller au cours mais se tenir a jour dans les lectures. Mid-Terme vraiment difficile... et réflète moyennement la matière.
teacherRatingTags: ['Beware of pop quizzes', 'Lecture heavy', 'Get ready to read']

rComments: his lectures are so boring........ honestly read the text book, he makes no effort whatsoever to explain anything to you. he actually sent an email saying he wasn't going to answer questions anymore and to just post them on discussion so that he MIGHT review it during revision class.  You will most likely do horrible on his exams.
His lectures will put you straight to sleep and his exams are stupidly difficult.
Not stimulating at all, hard material that he doesn't make any effort to make our understand easier.

I had him for the first half of intro to cellular biology (french) and his exam was stupidly hard. I failed it even after having studied for it more than any other midterm I had this year. Although his explanations are clear, he's monotone and has no sense of humour. He also spends half the class complaining about the slightest whispers in the room
He's really hard
He's a very tough marker. Impossible to satisfy
he's ok and good at explaining, but really strict when it comes to exams

Speaks really fast and gets easily frustrated if he only slightly hears people whispering in class; don't worry, he will ask you to be quiet. In terms of easiness, if it wasn't for the fact that we had to memorize the whole BIO1540 class notes word for word, it wouldn't have been too bad.
He's helpfull, but useless to do the quizzes and a lab exma (WHY?). Memorize the lab mannual if possible.
Good person, but his quiz are useless except if you want bonus point. The ta goes over again what to do in the lab. He's helpfull if you ask and go see him.
He is a nice guy, but he is not clear at all, he mumbles his words, makes mistakes on the powerpoint, and the material doesn`t represent what are on the exams.

Nice enough guy if you ever see him.  This class was more irritating than anything.  Marking for the labs is so ridiculous.  My advice: memorize the lab manual because they test you on every minutia.  The labs are all about the TAs - if you get a good one you're lucky.  Some  don't even major in Biology - what a joke.

The labs were ok but the TAs really didn't know what they were doing.  Prelabs were adequate, but there is a general attitude from the staff to screw you out of grades.  Marks for cleaning up-gimme a break!  The final sucked-it started off easy then got ridiculous.  What the hell is wrong with the bio dept. at Ottawa U?  It's crap!

He's nice and is open to answering questions, but the way he explains is not the best. He just answers you with yes or no and then expects you to figure it out. And the labs for this course are ridiculous and the i think the marking scheme is just very anal.
Avaron is a great lab coordinator. Easy going, clear on what he wants, and is really helpful. Whenever he walked into the lab room, everyone got a +10 bonus to their lab skill due to his aura effect.
